ol.li: assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722)
assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:7733)
representedOrganization, if present, SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734)
representedOrganization, if present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735)
representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736)
representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737)
Contains exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Assigned Entity
assignedEntity SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7722)
assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7731)
assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7732)
assignedEntity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:7733)
representedOrganization, if present, SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:7734)
representedOrganization, if present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] name (CONF:7735)
representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:7736)
representedOrganization, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:7737)
